tag_list: datacenter-virtualization, cloud-computing, private-cloud, public-cloud, hybrid-cloud, vmware, cisco, emc, vce, soa, itaas, paas, iaas, saas, unified-computing, servers, unified-storage, san, nas, converged-networking
overview:
Senior Information Technology Professional with Extensive Expertise in Advanced Datacenter Architecture including Virtualization & Cloud Computing Infrastructure.

Senior Information Technology Professional with nearly twenty years of Extensive Leadership, Architecture, Engineering, and Implementation Experience with a Demonstrated Aptitude for Understanding, Learning, and Applying Industry Best-Practices, Strategies, and Methodologies Resulting in Efficient and Effective Delivery of Advanced Datacenter Infrastructure Technologies including VMware Datacenter, Server, Desktop Virtualization and Cloud Computing Infrastructure Platforms; Cisco Unified Computing System (UCS), Nexus Converged Networking, and Catalyst Stackable and Modular Switch Platforms; EMC Unified Storage, Business Continuity and Availability, Backup and Recovery Platforms; VCE Vblock Infrastructure Platforms; Complex Enterprise-Class Multi-Tiered and Secure Service Provider Multi-Tenant Environments; Public, Private, and Hybrid Cloud Computing Deployment Models; Cloud Computing Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) Strategies and Methodologies including Information Technology as a Service (ITaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS) 

Accomplished Information Technology Evangelist, Leader, Architect, and Implementation Professional with an Aptitude for Intuitively Understanding, Learning, Analyzing, and Applying New Technologies and Industry Best-Practices, Strategies, and Methodologies Resulting in the Design and Delivery of the Most Efficient and Effective Solutions Available to Meet or Exceed Today’s Large, Medium, and Small Enterprise Business Requirements.

Strengths include a Broad Set of Skills with Extensive Experience Across Multiple Technology and Business Operating Disciplines. A Highly Motivated Team Player-Coach with Proven Leadership Qualities including a Strong Work Ethic, Ownership of and Accountability for Defined Responsibilities, Dedication, Dependability, Strong Attention to Detail, Communication across all Functional Business Levels, and a Demonstrated Ability to Work Within Budget and Time Constraints.
